feed.title: Hatsu Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Hatsu: v0.1.0 "01_ballade"
entry.content:
The first stable release of Hatsu!

Full Changelog: https://github.com/importantimport/hatsu/compare/v0.1.0-beta.1...v0.1.0

Song

entry.title: New release for Hatsu: v0.1.1
entry.content:
Features

Custom emojis are now supported! example:

jsonc { "ancestors": [], "descendants": [ { ... "content": "This is a test message :acat_chew:", "emojis": [ { "shortcode": "acat_chew", "url": "https://example.com/emoji/mergans_cats/acat_chew.webp", "static_url": "https://example.com/emoji/mergans_cats/acat_chew.webp", "visible_in_picker": false } ], ... } ] }

Chore

Now update to the x86-64-v3 target for x86_64 builds. https://github.com/importantimport/hatsu/commit/6660120e10086f3990c519e3717a31451b468db5

Full Changelog: https://github.com/importantimport/hatsu/compare/v0.1.0...v0.1.1

entry.title: New release for Hatsu: v0.2.0 "celluloid"
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: add missing slash in hashtag URL by @jordemort in https://github.com/importantimport/hatsu/pull/23
  • feat: receive Like activity by @kwaa in https://github.com/importantimport/hatsu/pull/24
  • feat: receive Announce activity by @kwaa in https://github.com/importantimport/hatsu/pull/25
  • refactor(env): new HATSU_ENV_FILE option by @kwaa in https://github.com/importantimport/hatsu/pull/28
  • refactor(feed): improve structure & compatibility by @kwaa in https://github.com/importantimport/hatsu/pull/29
  • fix(apub): set note visibility to public by @reesericci in https://github.com/importantimport/hatsu/pull/30
  • feat: use human-panic by @kwaa in https://github.com/importantimport/hatsu/pull/32
  • fix(feed): use logo as fallback by @kwaa in https://github.com/importantimport/hatsu/pull/34
  • refactor(feed)!: improve structure by @kwaa in https://github.com/importantimport/hatsu/pull/35
  • feat: _hatsu.aliases top-level extension by @kwaa in https://github.com/importantimport/hatsu/pull/36
  • feat(scheduler): update user info by @kwaa in https://github.com/importantimport/hatsu/pull/37
  • feat(apub): provide user attachments by @kwaa in https://github.com/importantimport/hatsu/pull/38
  • refactor(apub): move service to user by @kwaa in https://github.com/importantimport/hatsu/pull/39
  • feat: support tokio-console by @kwaa in https://github.com/importantimport/hatsu/pull/40

New Contributors

  • @jordemort made their first contribution in https://github.com/importantimport/hatsu/pull/23
  • @kwaa made their first contribution in https://github.com/importantimport/hatsu/pull/24
  • @reesericci made their first contribution in https://github.com/importantimport/hatsu/pull/30

Full Changelog: https://github.com/importantimport/hatsu/compare/v0.1.1...v0.2.0

Song

entry.title: New release for Hatsu: v0.2.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • refactor(tracing)!: rename HATSU_LOG_LEVEL to HATSU_LOG by @kwaa in https://github.com/importantimport/hatsu/pull/42
  • feat: new generate_204 api by @kwaa in https://github.com/importantimport/hatsu/pull/44
  • refactor: use flake instead of devbox by @kwaa in https://github.com/importantimport/hatsu/pull/45
  • refactor(flake)!: setup crane by @kwaa in https://github.com/importantimport/hatsu/pull/46
  • fix(ci): enable vendored openssl in normal build by @kwaa in https://github.com/importantimport/hatsu/pull/47
  • refactor: allow custom version by @kwaa in https://github.com/importantimport/hatsu/pull/48
  • feat(tracing): trace http response & pretty by @kwaa in https://github.com/importantimport/hatsu/pull/49

Full Changelog: https://github.com/importantimport/hatsu/compare/v0.2.0...v0.2.1

entry.title: New release for Hatsu: v0.2.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: add contrib files by @kwaa in https://github.com/importantimport/hatsu/pull/51
  • refactor(utils/data): tips for missing env by @kwaa in https://github.com/importantimport/hatsu/pull/52
  • chore(deps): bump version by @kwaa in https://github.com/importantimport/hatsu/pull/53

Full Changelog: https://github.com/importantimport/hatsu/compare/v0.2.1...v0.2.2
